channel.title: Course Textbooks :: K-State CIS 580 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 580 - Fundamentals of Game Programming course at Kansas State University. This front matter is specific to that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. The primary textbook for the class is Robert Nystromâ€™s Game Programming Patterns, an exploration of common design patterns used in video games. It can be bought in print, but he also has a free web version at https://gameprogrammingpatterns.
